Flux | London | Full Time | ONSITE | tryflux.com

Hey we’re hiring over at Flux (tryflux.com) - we’re building API’s that enable you to see what you’ve bought - not just where you bought it, and delivering receipts right back into your banking app.

We’re looking for people to work with of all levels (and are open to people who want to learn Kotlin) - our entire codebase is in :kotlin: and we’re making good use of cool features such as co-routines and cool tech such as GraphQL, Ktor and so on!

• Salaries are between £50k and £80k dependent on experience (and equity!) • We work from home on Fridays! • Annual team trip • The office is based in Luke St, London - not far from Old Street/Moorgate/Shoreditch.

You can talk to me here/via email (tobie@tryflux.com) or apply/read more via the following links: • https://angel.co/flux-13/jobs/462560-senior-kotlin-developer • https://angel.co/flux-13/jobs/462565-mid-level-kotlin-develo...
